pr_title: fix: Error importing data values in first time

timeline.message: fix: Error importing data values in first time.
fix: Error importing data values in first time.

timeline.author: stian-sandvold

timeline.bodyText: Ideally, the close statement should have its own try-finally block, as the commit operation might also fail, leaving the session open. Perhaps move those two statements to a utility method.
timeline.author: larshelge

replies.bodyText: Agree, fixed by adding method DbmsUtils.closeStatelessSession( session );
replies.author: vietnguyen
